gameDetails.name: Lords of Vegas: Underworld
gameDetails.description:
Packed with mobsters, showgirls, and accountants, Lords of Vegas: Underworld lets you grow your empire while you line your pockets. Get a private jet, open a blackjack hall, or bet it all with Sammy the Snail. Your sky-high casinos will become a lot more colorful with this street-level expansion.

—description from the publisher
